column5: Hi Guys,  Travelling up to Marten River area next week.  I always enjoy using leeches for smallmouth and walleye.  I am wondering how is the availablity or should I be looking prior to getting to camp.  If so, any suggestions along Highway 11.

Billy Bobs off Lakeshore in north Bay should have them. Also a little further of !! (about 15 minutes) is Bowmans Bait in the village of Nipissing on 654 then right on Lk.Nipissing RD.Bowmans is 17 bucks for 1/2 pound which is about 7 dozen.

Not sure how far north you're going, but there is a great bait and tackle shop that's just a hop skip and a jump south of Wilson Lake Road on the east side of hwy 11 that has leeches, worms, and minnows. [about 30 km north of Marten River]
Zip through Sturgeon and I'll get all you want ...

Discount Bait and Tackle at the lights (corner of Hwy 11 bypass and Hwy.63 right in North Bay) has leeches right now. Kiddie corner to the Beer Store. The place Joey is talking about is Gramps. Awesome store.
